message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities", there is a line item called "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 352857.55. This represents the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets) during the period.

This is the only line item in the statement that refers to payments for long-term assets, so this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '352857.55'} }
```
